Summary: Silver; Highly Refective; dart or cigar shape; huge, seemingly trailing jet
divs: sighting detailsgazing at high soaring vultures in a mostly sunny sky from a porch in point pleasant. facing due south at a patch of blue sky i contempated a jet heading south. i was wearing dark aviator sunglasses. the jet, i assumed to be commercial, left 4, disipating contrails (about 3" at arms lenght)- the actual jet was hardly visable- a smudge. minutes later i saw a vividly clear; dart\cigar shape; silver\chrome highly reflective object seemingly tracking the jet. the oject appeared to be huge, approx, 1\2" at arms lenght and moved at extremely high speed. i heard the faint roar of the jet, but no sound from object. the "dart" seemed to appear then vanish. observation duration 1 second. i actually stood up to reaquire visual- gone. that's it.
